body: We’ve sent a confirmation to [email address].

components.html:
## What happens next

The claim team will let you know they’ve received your claim within 5 working days. 

They’ll then process your claim within a further 15 working days and let you know the outcome.

They’ll contact you if there’s anything missing and your claim may take longer. 

If you need help with your claim you can call [SSCL phoneline number] or email cff@sscl.gse.gov.uk.


## Support organisations
The following organisations give support and advice:

- Child Bereavement UK
- Cruse Bereavement Care
- Sands
- Tommy’s

heading: Your claim has been submitted
